description: Complete analytics map for in-app ads including native inline ads (route details, checkout payment methods) and banner ads (home screen, regular bus screen).

adUnitId.description: Google Ad Manager ad unit ID for the ad placement.

placement.description: Ad placement identifier; always `default` for all ads in this flow.

screen.description: Screen name where the ad is displayed.

nativeAdLoadTime.description: Time taken to load the native inline ad in milliseconds.

nativeAdAspectRatio.description: Native ad media aspect ratio (width/height) as a float. Optional; may be missing or 0 when unknown.

nativeAdLoadSource.description: Source of the native ad load - either directly loaded or from prefetch cache.

nativeAdAdditionalData.description: Additional ad metadata string (optional) added by component layer; currently a comma-separated `key:value` list.

hasVideo.description: True if the native ad contains video content.

adLoadTime.description: Time taken to load the banner ad in milliseconds.

valueMicros.description: Ad revenue value in micros (1/1,000,000 of the currency unit) from Google Ad Manager.

currencyCode.description: Currency code for the ad revenue (e.g., USD, INR).

precision.description: Precision type for the ad revenue value from Google Ad Manager.

responseId.description: Google Ad Manager response ID for the ad request.

[Adjust]ReferrerDeviceId.description: Referrer device ID parsed from Adjust click label (when present).

[Adjust]ReferrerMobileNumber.description: Referrer mobile number parsed from Adjust click label (when present).

stages.name: Native Inline Ad Lifecycle
stages.description: Native ads shown inline within route details and checkout payment methods screens.

stages.name: Banner Ad Lifecycle
stages.description: Banner ads shown inline within home screen and regular bus screen.

stages.name: Adjust Attribution Callbacks
stages.description: Adjust SDK callbacks received by the app (used for attribution diagnostics).

events.name: Adjust Attribution Received
events.description: Fired when Adjust attribution callback is received and added to super properties.

properties.context: Referrer device ID parsed from clickLabel (optional).
Referrer mobile number parsed from clickLabel (optional).

events.name: Adjust Label Info Received
events.description: Fired when Adjust clickLabel is parsed into referrer/referred fields.

properties.context: Referrer device ID parsed from clickLabel (optional).
Referrer mobile number parsed from clickLabel (optional).

events.name: banner ad clicked
events.description: Fired when the user clicks on a banner ad.

properties.context: Screen name where ad is displayed.

events.notes: sendToPlotline is false; frequency is Always.

events.name: banner ad impression
events.description: Fired when a banner ad impression is recorded by Google SDK.

properties.context: Screen name where ad is displayed.

events.notes: sendToPlotline is false; frequency is Always.

events.name: banner ad loaded
events.description: Fired when a banner ad successfully loads.

properties.context: Screen name where ad is displayed.

events.notes: sendToPlotline is false; frequency is Always.

events.name: banner ad paid impression
events.description: Fired when a paid impression event is received from Google Ad SDK with revenue information.

properties.context: Screen name where ad is displayed.
Precision type from Google Ad Manager.

events.notes: sendToPlotline is false; frequency is Always.

events.name: banner ad requested
events.description: Fired when a banner ad request is initiated on home screen or regular bus screen.

properties.context: The ad unit ID for this placement.

events.notes: sendToPlotline is false; frequency is Always.

events.name: native inline ad clicked
events.description: Fired when the user clicks on the native inline ad.

properties.context: Native ad media aspect ratio (width/height) as a float.
Screen name where ad is displayed.

events.notes: sendToPlotline is false; frequency is Always.

events.name: native inline ad impression
events.description: Fired when the native inline ad impression is recorded (via Google SDK callback or paid event).

properties.context: Native ad media aspect ratio (width/height) as a float.
Screen name where ad is displayed.

events.notes: sendToPlotline is false; frequency is Always.

events.name: native inline ad loaded
events.description: Fired when a native inline ad successfully loads and binds to the view. Called from component layer with additional metadata.

properties.context: Screen name where ad is displayed.
Native ad media aspect ratio (width/height) as a float. Optional; may be missing or 0 when unknown.
Additional ad metadata string (optional) added by component layer; currently a comma-separated `key:value` list.

events.notes: sendToPlotline is false; frequency is Always.

events.name: native inline ad paid impression
events.description: Fired when a paid impression event is received from Google Ad SDK with revenue information.

properties.context: Native ad media aspect ratio (width/height) as a float.
Screen name where ad is displayed.
Precision type from Google Ad Manager.

events.notes: sendToPlotline is false; frequency is Always.

events.name: native inline ad rendered
events.description: Fired when the native inline ad is actually rendered in the UI for the first time.

properties.context: Native ad media aspect ratio (width/height) as a float.
Screen name where ad is displayed.

events.notes: sendToPlotline is false; frequency is Always.

events.name: native inline ad requested
events.description: Fired when a native inline ad request is initiated on route details or checkout payment methods screen.

properties.context: The ad unit ID for this placement.

events.notes: sendToPlotline is false; frequency is Always.

diagram.notes: Both ad types follow similar lifecycles: request → load → impression/render → click (optional) → paid impression. Native ads have an additional 'rendered' event. Paid impressions include revenue data. All events use screen property to segment by placement.
